nodes.text: Corell Industries Limited, also called CI Limited or just CI, was a a Corellian shipping concern that ferried goods to worlds within the Corellian system and to Centerpoint Station.

For a time, CI was one of the top investment opportunities in the Corellian system. But in part because of actions taken by the monopolistic Trade Federation, which was devouring small shipping concerns one after the other, CI's fortunes began to decline, and inaction from the Galactic Senate failed to provide any help. The company's profits began sliding and CI was forced to sell off its fleet of ships at ridiculously low prices, before ultimately succumbing to bankruptcy.
